Cygnus Developer's Kit: Progressive--95q4

The progressive--95q4 release is available for these native and cross-development configurations:

For discussion of the three-part naming scheme used to configure your software for each host/target combination, see section Specifying Names for Hosts and Targets.

These are the current version numbers for the individual programs in the progressive--95q4 release:
